sqlMap.statement: SELECT AP_INV_ID AP_INV_ID , AP_VND_CD AP_VND_CD , AP_VND_INV_NUM AP_VND_INV_NUM , AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM , REM_SQ_NUM REM_SQ_NUM , VND_CD VND_CD , VND_INV_NUM VND_INV_NUM , VND_INV_SQ_NUM VND_INV_SQ_NUM , AP_INV_LINE_NUM AP_INV_LINE_NUM , AP_VND_INV_NUM INVOICE_NUMBER_L15_IF , AP_INV_LINE_NUM LINE_NUMBER_L5_IF , SUBSTR(AP_INV_DESC_TXT, 0, 32) DESCRIPTION_L32_IF , AC_INV_JRNL_COST_AMT INVOICE_AMOUNT_N15_IF , COA_CMPY_CD COA_1_L3_IF , COA_BR_CD COA_2_L3_IF , COA_CC_CD COA_3_L6_IF , COA_ACCT_CD COA_4_L8_IF , COA_PROD_CD COA_5_L2_IF , COA_CH_CD COA_6_L3_IF , COA_AFFL_CD COA_7_L3_IF , COA_PROJ_CD COA_8_L4_IF , COA_EXTN_CD COA_9_L3_IF FROM CM_IF_OPEN_AP_DTL WHERE EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND IF_PROC_STS_CD = 'N'
